intro: Cynanchum elegans, commonly known as the elegant milkweed, is a flowering plant native to the eastern United States. It is a member of the Asclepiadaceae family, which includes milkweeds, and is characterized by its milky sap. The plant typically grows in moist, wooded areas and has opposite, lance-shaped leaves. Its flowers are clustered in umbels and are usually pink or purple in color. Cynanchum elegans is known for its medicinal properties and has been used traditionally in herbal remedies.
